actions.text: Motion to table amendment SA 832 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 49. Record Vote Number: 199.

Amendment SA 832 proposed by Senator Kennedy. (consideration:  CR S7097-7101; text:  CR S7098) To extend the Temporary Unemployment Compensation Act of 2002, to provide additional weeks of temporary extended unemployment compensation, and to make extended unemployment benefits under the Railroad Unemployment Insurance Act temporarily available for employees.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 832 proposed by Senator Kennedy.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 832 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 49. Record Vote Number: 199.

purpose: To extend the Temporary Unemployment Compensation Act of 2002, to provide additional weeks of temporary extended unemployment compensation, and to make extended unemployment benefits under the Railroad Unemployment Insurance Act temporarily available for employees.
